ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: Um. I have to F10 to put the backpack slot into my hotkey slots. (or any hotkey) But not to open the backpack. I play in full screen all the time, and fish
ygData.messageBody:
Um. I have to F10 to put the backpack slot into my hotkey slots.
(or any hotkey) But not to open the backpack.

I play in full screen all the time, and fish with a backpack there, etc.
And have had no problems opening it.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 28 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 8 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro, Phoenix /

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
>Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 5:54 AM

>Make sure that you are not playing a song - then open your inventory screen
>and right click it. I think that you could put the inv slot onto a hot key
>pad but then you may need to be in the F10 view for it to work
>(not sure but
>I know you have to F10 to open backpacks and such when they are hot keyed)
>Most likely, you just need to stop song then right cilick. I doubt they
>have a level cap above 44 on the item.
>
>Sylly
